page.title: 20Transport
page.content: Running across our D block is the A65 ,a very busy road.By taking several traffic counts we found that approx.8,220,576 vehicles use the road in one year.By further calculation we discovered this is one vehicle every 4 seconds! From a survey carried out in school we found that 104 out of 128 families used a car for work.39% of those surveyed said the roads were in poor condition,but many said that public transport was good.Excessive speed and too many heavy lorries were two major worries. Though only the runway is in our D block,the airport is a cause for concern.64% of the survey were in favour of the runway extension,30% mentioning increased employment as areason.Only 14% were against futher developments.
